member.name: T:Property.ArrayAttribute
member.summary: Marks a field as a fixed-size array for property code generation. The field type must be an inline array struct (C# [InlineArray]) so element access is allocation-free.

member.name: T:Property.Array2DAttribute
member.summary: Marks a field as a fixed-size 2D array (row-major) for property code generation. The field type must be an inline array struct (C# [InlineArray]) of TotalLength elements.
